hero_subtitle: Explore the world through Adisutjipto International Airport. A connectivity hub with global service standards.
facilities_subtitle: Our modern facilities are designed to make your travel experience smooth and enjoyable.
facility_checkin_desc: A fast and efficient check-in process through various counters and self-service kiosks.
facility_lounge_desc: Relax before your flight in our comfortable lounge with various premium amenities.
facility_retail_desc: Enjoy a wide selection of retail stores and restaurants to meet all your needs.
facility_transport_desc: Easy connectivity with various modes of land transportation to the city center.
